object.name: BusinessConnection
object.description: Describes the connection of the bot with a business account.
object.html_description: Describes the connection of the bot with a business account.
object.rst_description: Describes the connection of the bot with a business account.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Business account user that created the business connection
annotations.html_description: Business account user that created the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Business account user that created the business connection
annotations.name: user

annotations.description: Identifier of a private chat with the user who created the business connection. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.html_description: Identifier of a private chat with the user who created the business connection. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of a private chat with the user who created the business connection. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.name: user_chat_id

annotations.description: Date the connection was established in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the connection was established in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the connection was established in Unix time
annotations.name: date

annotations.description: True, if the connection is active
annotations.name: is_enabled

annotations.description: True, if the bot can act on behalf of the business account in chats that were active in the last 24 hours
annotations.html_description: True, if the bot can act on behalf of the business account in chats that were active in the last 24 hours
annotations.rst_description: True, if the bot can act on behalf of the business account in chats that were active in the last 24 hours
annotations.name: can_reply
